name: Blue Knight (ItsIdzA)
description:
Blue Knight is my 2nd game, after my just released 1st game "Running Cube 8-()".

So In this game you'll need to kill the Enemys and there will be an End Boss too which you'll be need to kill if you wanna finish the game. So there are currently 4 different types of them:

  1. Skeleton (100HP, 10DMG, 65% Speed)
  2. Goblin (65HP, 15DMG, 80% Speed)
  3. Mushroom (80HP, 25DMG 65% Speed)
  4. Flying Eye (55HP, 15DMG, 70% Speed)

If you press "Ctrl" (Control) + "L" in the main menu you get a preview how they'll look like. 

I really hope that you like this game, even if it's just the alpha version 1.1. If you wanna support me, you can donate me a little bit pocket money ;). Be focused for the new updates wich will be released soon and have a nice day ! 

Greetings IdzA.
